app_description.message: Quickly search for the Selected text on the Web.

common_about_custom_filter_1.message: This extension uses the browser's default search engine.

common_about_custom_filter_2.message: To change the search engine, please add a custom filter from the advanced settings.

common_sample_custom_filter_2.message: You can use the following functions to construct the path to the destination for any site.

common_delete_custom_filter_confirm.message: Do you want to delete this filter?

common_no_custom_filters.message: There is no filter. The browser's default search engine is always used.

common_has_custom_filters.message: The filters are applied in order from the top. If none of them apply, the browser's default search engine is used.

common_about_custom_filters_regexp_1.message: You can control the destination of the transition within.

common_about_custom_filters_regexp_2.message: If this is specified, it will match all sites.
